t: LogRite Log Stand : Amazon.com.au: Garden
s: With this setup, I am able to manage most any log I come across with ease. Prior to the LogRite, I was rolling the logs to keep the chainsaw hitting the dirt. Now, I can quickly pull a log and use the stand to lift the log off the ground for easy cutting into firewood lengths.
